    • getAdjacent

      public List<TreeTentCell> getAdjacent(TreeTentCell cell, TreeTentType type)
      Get a list of all orthogonally adjacent cells.
      Parameters:
      cell - The cell to get adjacent cells from.
      type - The cell types to get.
      Returns:
      List of adjacent cells in the form { up, right, down, left }. If an adjacent cell is null, it will not be added to the list.

    • getDiagonals

      public List<TreeTentCell> getDiagonals(TreeTentCell cell, TreeTentType type)
      Gets all cells of a specified type that are diagonals of a specified cell
      Parameters:
      cell - the base cell
      type - the type to look for
      Returns:
      a list of TreeTentCells that are diagonals of the given TreeTentCell and are of the given TreeTentType

    • getRowCol

      public List<TreeTentCell> getRowCol(int index, TreeTentType type, boolean isRow)
      Creates and returns a list of TreeTentCells that match the given TreeTentType
      Parameters:
      index - the row or column number
      type - type of TreeTent element
      isRow - boolean value based on whether a row of column is being checked
      Returns:
      List of TreeTentCells that match the given TreeTentType
